meanings.definition: The act of mistakenly identifying someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The misidentification of the suspect led to the wrong person being arrested.
meanings.sent2: There was a misidentification of the rare bird species by the amateur birdwatcher.
meanings.sent3: The misidentification of the teacher as a student caused quite a humorous mix-up in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: Her misidentification of the poison ivy plant for a harmless vine left her with an itchy rash.
meanings.sent5: The misidentification of the twins was finally resolved when their different birthmarks were noticed.

meanings.definition: A mistaken identification of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The misidentification in the lineup resulted in the wrong person being chosen as the culprit.
meanings.sent2: The misidentification of the actor as a famous celebrity caused quite a stir at the event.
meanings.sent3: The misidentification of the dog as a wolf made for a funny moment at the pet show.
meanings.sent4: His misidentification of the rare coin as a regular one cost him a significant amount of money.
meanings.sent5: The misidentification of the painting's artist was finally corrected by an art expert.
